Package com.jme.post.filters

Class FadeFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.post.Filter
      • com.jme.post.filters.FadeFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme.export.Savable
    public class FadeFilter
extends com.jme.post.Filter
    Fade Filter allows you to make an animated fade effect on a scene.
    Author:
    RÃ©my Bouquet aka Nehon implemented from boxjar implementation
    See Also:
    http://jmonkeyengine.org/groups/graphics/forum/topic/newbie-question-general-fade-inout-effect/#post-105559
